storyInfo: After a series of twists and turns, the Doctor, Amiya, and a group of operators arrive at the core city of Chernobog.

attributes.content: You're right. We're on a tight schedule.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Um... we do that sometimes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the core city is on the move. It will be hard to get into the foundation levels.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the operators stand on the sand and wait for the city to pass over them, both height and speed are going to be an issue.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: If they can't open the maintenance hatches and waste chutes on the underside, our distraction and our camouflage won't be worth anything.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: So our five teams will take a vehicle and use the cover of the sandstorm to approach the city, then employ special equipment to climb into the city superstructure.Â
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: We're in no hurry to get the attention of the local Ursus brass.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: And we wouldn't want them to send out an attack ship to smash Rhodes Island in the wilderness and kill our employees.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Even if they did that, you wouldn't see a single report on it in any newspaper. The bankers and insurance executives will quietly cross out your name and shove all the lucre into their own nest eggs.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: No one will speak of you. No one wants to upset Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Our neutrality gives us some freedom to move in the cracks between forces, and that means we can't be backed by any power.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: We survive by working in secret. Just like when we sent those teams to save you.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Five teams. Leave tracks, cover the tracks; objective complete, objective failed. No matter what, Rhodes Island only ever deploys five teams.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: But more teams means more firepower!;......;Even if they

attributes.content: Even for a city-state like Lungmen, wiping us out would be a trifle.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You saw the L.G.D. They're as strong as any country's special forces. They certainly have a pharmaceutical company beat.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: So why do they need us?

attributes.content: Because this is about the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has departed Lungmen, and we're bearing on the next trade port at fifteen kilometers per hour.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: We'll be in the wilderness for a few weeks before we get there.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Aside from some nearby Rhodes Island communications specialists and some trusted vessels, no one will pick up our signal. We'll plot a course around all the nomadic cities' known paths.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Even if Lungmen decides to betray us, they won't be able to find us.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: We need more oomph!;Need to be sharper.;We must have more to stake.

attributes.content: Right. We will need something else to tip the scales.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The both of you turned pretty gloomy, huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know how serious this is, but you don't have to... smile like that, do you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya... did I smile?
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: I know you did. Your lips may not have moved, but I could feel it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So here we are.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: ...Yay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, I have to say this: I do not intend to rebuild any sort of relationship with this person.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.options: Heh. The feeling is mutual.;......;You may be forgetting there

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Myself, Amiya, and three of our elite operators will lead the five teams.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: We have three combat teams, one recon team, and one spec ops team.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: You may want to meet the leader of one of those teams.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Rosmontis! Wait!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh... Blaze.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're badly wounded. Why are you here? You should go back. Go on.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Are you going to sortie this time?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'll get someone to replace you. How about Misery? He's better at assault ops than you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He'll wave his hand and it'll be all done. Let's have him go.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You don't want me to go?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yeah. You shouldn't.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're giving me a weird feeling, Blaze.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This isn't like the missions you went on before!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Because I might die?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Watch it!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You can't just... like... you can't just come out and say it like that!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're too young for such a dangerous mission. It's not right!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But Amiya's going too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's because she...! She's...!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She's...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She's just like me. She's Infected. She's an operator.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And I checked the logs. Ace and Scout are both in Chernobog. They didn't come back.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That means they're gone.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to see. I want to know what happened. I want to see who's running Reunion. I want to know who did what.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to know what happened to Ace and Scout.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis? You don't have to record... that kind of stuff.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Blaze?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Shit. What the hell am I saying...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No, sorry, I shouldn't have said that. Damn my big mouth!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But, their deaths... They...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'm the one who's wrong. We have happy memories, and painful ones too. You have to remember them both.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're weird, Blaze. Your words are all scattered and broken.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...I don't want to see you hurting so much. Why do you have to look back at them? You... you can let go of those memories.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You can put them there, leave them there, and don't look back.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If I don't look... then what's the point in recording them?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If I don't look... then they're forgotten.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I won't forget. I definitely won't forget a single death.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ha. Right. You're like me. You're a Rhodes Island elite operator.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I can't go in your place. Really, I...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Nng... ugh...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're bleeding again?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'll take you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Oof.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Rosmontis... You and Amiya look after yourselves.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Right. I will.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Do I have to? Meet her...?

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's elite operators, for whatever reason, dedicate their talent and energy to the Rhodes Island project.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The teams they bring with them fully support their work. Because our elite operators, to a certain degree, can directly determine how we use a certain tactic.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But not all of them are... exactly as we imagine them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've met Elite Operator Blaze, Doctor. There are a lot of rumors about her, maybe you haven't heard. The truth is, they're a little exaggerated.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But everyone has a different impression of her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But Doctor, I think... I think you're capable of understanding her choices.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Judging by your reaction, you may have already met the one we're talking about.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Oh? Huh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then... we're okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's the basic plan. Honestly, um... it's practical. A plan's a plan, an operation's an operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the op is what matters. A plan is just a basic outline of an operation. And a misstep during an operation can shatter a plan.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Uh oh... that ain't good! We have a problem!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Dust density is still too low. This isn't going to work with that light angle.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: We're in the open here! If they look down from the bridge, they might spot us before we're fully operational!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: But we can't cover the machine any more than it already is. If we block the airflow, we won't get enough of a current going to kick up the dust!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What do we do? Should we keep moving back...? We might not have time!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: ...I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Firewatch, keep an eye out, and tell me which way to adjust.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Lady? What... are you doing?
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Fixing the angle of the light
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: To mitigate the suffering of the world... I believe even the sun itself will bow to me.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Oh? Who's that on the dune? Nearl? They're not saddling up and not falling back?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What's she doing? Meditating? Posing... is she posing here?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...No, wait, what's that light? Her whole body is glowing... No, uh oh! Too bright!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Um, thanks, Captain...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Thanks for covering my eyes, but it would be great if you weren't squeezing like you wanted to crush my skull.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What is Nearl doing?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: She's okay? Well... you say that, Captain, but that light is brighter than the sun. What is she up to?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Huh? No way... she's pulling in all the light around us?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Woah.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Captain, all the light is starting to form together.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I know. I'm just saying, could anyone but the Radiant Knight do something like this?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Captain, look at the shadows of the sand dunes. Can you even tell what time of day it is?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I'm just trying to brighten the mood here. And once we kick up that sandstorm, we won't be able to see the shadows, right?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Shutting up. Sorry.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Take us up! We've got some weird-colored balls clipping us!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Don't be scared, Instructor. Reunion casters aren't good enough to shoot us down.
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: We're just a distraction, no need to put on an air show for Reunion!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Put on a good enough show and Reunion might just surrender, huh?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Isn't that what they call a show of force?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Aerial acrobatics isn't a show of force!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Instructor!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: âI need a barf bag!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: The device is fully functional! Amiya, we're ready to move!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Drivers, maintain a steady speed! Check your maps. Use the sandstorm to cover your approach to the core city until you're in range to deploy boarding gear! Engage!
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The sand will cover our tracks. Remember your protective gear, and don't let sand into our sensitive equipment!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I can see the sun. Why is the sunlight breaking through the sandstorm?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The underside of the core city is so clear, it's like... Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This wasn't... part of the plan. Is that natural light?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Don't worry about it!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Roger that! Grappling hooks, prepare to fire! Operators, make sure the cables are securely fixed to the underside of the city!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Once all our operators are aboard, the vehicles will depart at once! I don't usually say things like this, but I'm pretty sure that light just now is a good omen for us!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Definitely!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: (I made it a little too intense and had to aim it at the ground, but let's not tell her that part...)
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Hold on, the core city is speeding up?
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Our machines are wind-driven, but they can only keep the sandstorm up within a one kilometer range! If they break that range, they'll spot us for sure!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Hurry up, everyone!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're out of time! We have to slow down!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: If we drive out of the sandstorm,, Chernobog's optical detection system will pick us right up and blow the whole op!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: How many people do you have left? Hurry up and...
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: It's too dangerous, Doctor!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: You've never had operator training! We can't send you up there alone!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Didn't Dr. Kal'tsit assign you any battlefield support?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.options: Nope. What of it?;......;Maybe she thought I could use the exercise myself.

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Me.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: Kal'tsit grabbed by the waist with one arm and pulled you onto the zipline with the other.
Seize your own fate next time, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal

attributes.content: The sandstorm was ferocious, and the 'arm' holding you was very hard. You couldn't be certain it belonged to Kal'tsit.
All squads, take your positions!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is no room for error in the operation to come!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Core City Foundation
Yeah, this is definitely a sign of someone breaking in here.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Confirmed one infiltrator.Â
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We can't be sure if that bloodstain over there is Reunion's or someone else's. It hasn't turned yet.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It very well could be Officer Ch'en's! We have to hurry.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm glad you made it here safe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You call that safe...!;...close.;I had help. You were this close to losing me.

attributes.content: ...Oh? Huh?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Th-that dangerous, huh? Did you get hurt, Dr. {@nickname}?!
attributes.name: Amiya
